pages.text: $(li)The Warm Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is mainly composed by Sand.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation, like Corals Reefs and Sea Pickles.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Dolphins, Squids, Cods, Pufferfishes, Lionfishes, Tropical Fishes, Hammerhead Sharks can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can find Coral Squids swimming around of the Coral Reefs too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Warm Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
